name: PumpKill
description:
It's PumpKill time!

Welcome to my entry for the Spooktober Jam 2021! You'll control the pumpkiller and kill everyone you can to collect their blood. Even though it's pretty unfinished, I hope you guys like it!

@MelancholiaDev - Twitter - Programmer, Designer and Artist 

@guimiott0 - Instagram - Sound Designer

Controls:
  • WASD - Move PumpKiller
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Hold Right Mouse Button - Take Candy/Ammo from houses / Take Blood / Pour Blood
Tutorial:

Knock on doors to get candy to use as ammo and then shoot at everyone! They'll drop blood on the ground that you can pick up using the right mouse button and you can drop it at the ritual circle at the center of the map. 

Fill the ritual bar to win the game!
